title: Riot took back the key shards they gifted me
body: I have been playing a shit ton recently to get the last key shard I need so I can open a chest. Nothing. No drops, nothing. Straight up 30+ games with nothing. Then the next day I log in and I am happy to see that Riot was kind enough to give me 4 key shards for being sportsmanlike. I was pretty hyped. Then I go to the loot section to see that it's disabled. So I assumed that the 4 shards are to make up for that disturbance. But when its up again my shards are gone. Anyone else have this happen to them?

replies.body: i know that there was some hextec crafting buggs, so maybe try a ticket?
Yeah I did that, a riot support member gave me back the shards.
I know this is a biiiiit of a late reply, but it sounds like everything got sorted out in that ticket. Feel free to let me know if anything is still missing and I can check up on it as well ^_^.
